system.description: You forge a telepathic bond among yourself and a number of willing subjects. The bond can be established only among willing creatures. The bond allows the linked creatures to communicate telepathically through the bond regardless of language. No special power or influence is established as a result of the bond. Once the bond is formed, it works over any distance (although those on other planes cannot be reached). The bond can be ended by any participant as a standard action.

components.materialDescription: Two eggshells or two small ivory cones.

system.target: You plus one willing creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
